definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment

sentences.english: Conclusion It is useful for some kinetic parameters in gait of patella-femoral joint to be computed based on this model.
sentences.chinese: 结论该模型可以有效的计算髌股关节动力学参数。

sentences.english: A positive family history is a risk factor for recurrence and for contralateral patellofemoral instability.
sentences.chinese: 阳性家族史是复发和对侧髌股不稳定的危险因素。

sentences.english: Quadriceps and patellar tendons show normal signal intensity.
sentences.chinese: 四头肌和髌韧带显示正常信号强度。

sentences.english: Small osteophytes are seen in relation to the patellofemoral articulation more pronounced of the right.
sentences.chinese: 髌股关节相对面可见小的骨赘，右侧膝关节更明显。

sentences.english: The patellofemoral joint is best seen in the axial plane.
sentences.chinese: 髌股关节在轴位平面上显示最好。

sentences.english: The infrapatellar branch of descending genicular artery accompanied closely with saphenous nerve.
sentences.chinese: 膝降动脉髌下支和隐神经髌下支呈紧密的伴行关系。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
semitendinosus, one of the hamstring muscles in the thigh
